name: Wizard of Hunting Life
description:
Wizard of Hunting Life is an action RPG game.
Hunt to level up, earn money to buy equipment and challenge stronger enemies.

Adventurer's Guild

You can receive quests in the Adventurer's Guild.
The number of quests you can receive will increase by clearing the quests and increasing the adventurer rank.

Skill system

You will get skill points as your character's level goes up.
By using skill points, you can raise the skill level from the skill window.

blacksmith

At the blacksmith, you can use the money you get from the quest to buy equipment.


Please equip the purchased equipment from the inventory window.

Mouse and keyboard operation

Camera operation: Mouse movement

Move / Avoid: W key
(To avoid, press the move key twice in a row)
Move / Avoid: S key
Move to the left / Avoid: A key
Move to the right / Avoid: D key
Jump: Space bar
Shot: Left click
Shotgun: Right click
A7M Orb: Shot + Shotgun
Thunder Sword: Move Forward + Shot + Shotgun
Dragon Breath: Move Back + Shot + Shotgun
Skill window: K key
Pose: Esc key
Item selection: Arrow keys
Decision: Enter key
Speak: E key
Inventory: I key

Gamepad operation

Camera operation: Right stick

Move / Avoid: Left thumbstick Y-axis
(To avoid, press the move key twice in a row)
Move backward / Avoid: Left thumbstick Y-axis
Move / Avoid to the left: Left thumbstick X-axis
Move / Avoid to the right: Left thumbstick X-axis
Jump: A button
Shot: B button
Shotgun: Y button
A7M Orb: Shot + Shotgun
Thunder Sword: Move Forward + Shot + Shotgun
Dragon Breath: Move Back + Shot + Shotgun
Skill window: X button
Pose: Special right
Item selection: Analog stick / arrow keys
Enter: A button
Talk: A button
Inventory: Special left
